name: dailyui-011
title: #dailyui 011
description: Mockup of flash messages for success, loading, and error dialogs.

name: desk-setup
title: Desk Setup
description: Vector art of my desk setup. From left to right - phone on phone stand, laptop, monitor, takeout coffee, lamp, Sailor Moon figurines, tissue box.

name: crystal-carillon
title: Crystal Carillon
description: Vector art inspired by the Crystal Carillon from Sailor Moon, a heart-shaped weapon with a bell at the bottom.

name: portfolio-icons
title: Portfolio Icons
description: Icons I created in Sketch to represent the different projects in my portfolio. Each icon is a simiplified version of the project’s home page.

name: easing-graphs
title: Easing Graphs
description: Easing graphs useful for web development and animation, specifically highlighting easeInOut, eaesOutCirc, and easeInOutCirc.

name: self-portrait
title: Self-Portrait
description: Self-portrait done with vector art, where I’m wearing a pink turtleneck and purple lipstick.

name: scissor-blade
title: Scissor Blade
description: A 3d model inspired by the Scissor Blade from Studio Trigger’s Kill la Kill anime.

name: transistor
title: Transistor Blade
description: Vector art inspired by the blade from Supergiant Games’ Transistor.

name: shrine
title: Shrine Tower
description: A shrine tower 3d model based off of the Fushimi Inari shrine in Kyoto, Japan.
